Interface ReplaySyntax

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StartGameSyntax
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SettingsSyntax

    public interface ReplaySyntax
extends StartGameSyntax

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplaySyntax addReplayObserver(S2ReplayObserver replayObserver)
      Add an instance of S2ReplayObserver, each S2ReplayObserver will run a separate StarCraft II client.
      ReplaySyntax loadReplayList(Path path)
      Loads replays from a file.
      ReplaySyntax setReplayPath(Path path)
      Sets the path for to a folder of replays to analyze.
      ReplaySyntax setReplayRecovery(Boolean value)

      • addReplayObserver

        ReplaySyntax addReplayObserver(S2ReplayObserver replayObserver)
        Add an instance of S2ReplayObserver, each S2ReplayObserver will run a separate StarCraft II client.
        Parameters:
        replayObserver - A pointer to the replay observer to utilize.
        See Also:
        S2ReplayObserver
